description: Try our easy to follow Korean Tofu & Veg Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Sausage,High protein,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Low sugar,Tofu,Beef,Mushroom
name: Korean Tofu & Veg Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g firm tofu, drained, cut into 18 cubes
0.33 cup korean BBQ kalbi sauce & marinade

recipeInstructions.text: Thread tofu, mushrooms, tomatoes and capsicum alternately onto 6 skewers. Place on a baking tray. Spray with oil. Season.

Preheat a barbecue grill on high heat and the plate on medium-low. Cook sausages on plate for 15 minutes, turning frequently, or until cooked through. Meanwhile, cook skewers on grill, turning, for 10-12 minutes or until mushrooms are tender and tofu is warmed through. Baste with sauce for the last 5 minutes of cooking. Serve.
